name: How to Apply Brush On Block Mineral Powder Sunscreen
description: Step-by-step guide for applying mineral powder sunscreen for optimal sun protection

supply.name: Brush On Block SPF 30 Mineral Powder Sunscreen

step.name: Prepare the brush
step.text: Remove the brush cap and fluff the bristles gently to ensure even powder distribution.

step.name: Release the powder
step.text: Tap the brush gently against your hand or a surface to release the mineral powder into the bristles. You should see a light dusting of powder.

step.name: Apply to face
step.text: Using circular motions, apply the powder to your face, starting from the center and working outward. Pay special attention to high points like nose, cheeks, and forehead where sun exposure is greatest.

step.name: Extend to neck and chest
step.text: Continue application to your neck and d√©colletage in circular motions, ensuring even coverage of all sun-exposed areas.

step.name: Build coverage
step.text: For additional coverage or higher SPF protection, repeat the tapping and application process. Layer as desired for your skin's needs and the level of sun exposure expected.

step.name: Reapply regularly
step.text: Reapply every 2 hours, or immediately after swimming or sweating, for continuous protection. The powder format makes reapplication easy, even over makeup.
